title: Sparkle Slime Balloon
summaries: The Sparkle Slime Balloon is a Hardmode novelty consumable item. When thrown at players, enemies, and NPCs, it will inflict the Sparkle Slime debuff for 30 seconds. This debuff is only cosmetic and deals no damage. Diva Slime moves in after throwing a Sparkle Slime Balloon into Shimmer.

<linked>Queen Slime</linked> always drops 25–75 balloons upon her defeat. It is also dropped by <linked>Jungle Mimics</linked> in <linked>Celebrationmk10</linked> and <linked>get fixed boi</linked> worlds.

statistics.Sell: 40
